tool.name: Split VCF
tool.description: using a statistic or bed file
tool.command:
python $__tool_directory__/vcf_split.py --vcf $input --split-file $split_file --out-format $out_format --out-prefix $out_prefix --overwrite
#if $statistic_window_size --statistic-window-size $statistic_window_size #end if
#if $indv.assign_type == 'model_file' #if $indv.model_file --model-file $indv.model_file --model $indv.model #end if #end if
#if $indv.assign_type == 'indv_data' #if $indv.filter_include_indv_file --filter-include-indv-file $indv.filter_include_indv_file #end if #if $indv.filter_exclude_indv_file --filter-exclude-indv-file $indv.filter_exclude_indv_file #end if #if $indv.filter_include_indv #set include_indvs = [include_indv.strip() for include_indv in str($indv.filter_include_indv).split(",")] --filter-include-indv $include_indvs #end if #if $indv.filter_exclude_indv #set exclude_indvs = [exclude_indv.strip() for exclude_indv in str($indv.filter_exclude_indv).split(",")] --filter-exclude-indv $exclude_indvs #end if #end if
#if $filter_include_positions --filter-include-positions $filter_include_positions #end if
#if $filter_exclude_positions --filter-exclude-positions $filter_exclude_positions #end if
#if $filter_include_bed --filter-include-bed $filter_include_bed #end if
#if $filter_exclude_bed --filter-exclude-bed $filter_exclude_bed #end if

param.name: statistic_window_size
param.label: Statistic Window Size
param.help: Use if BIN_END is absent in the heder of the split file

param.name: filter_include_positions
param.label: Include Positions File
param.help: Tab-seperated file of chromosomes and positions

param.name: filter_exclude_positions
param.label: Exclude Positions File
param.help: Tab-seperated file of chromosomes and positions

tool.help:
**General Information**
*Split VCF* is used to split a single VCF into multiple loci-based VCFs. Loci are assigned using one of two methods: a statistic file or a bed file.
.. class:: infomark
The specified statistic file or bed file must contain loci-based (i.e. window-based) data for *Split VCF* to operate.
**Filters**
Two aspects of the selected VCF may be filtered: indviduals and positions.
- **Indviduals:** Test
- Test2
**Statistic File Method**
*Split VCF* requires statistic files to possess three columns with the following headers: **CHROM**, **BIN_START**, and **BIN_END**.
.. class:: infomark
If the specified statistic file does not contain the **BIN_END** column, the **Statistic Window Size** argument may be used.
**BED File Method**
*Split VCF* expects BED files to be of standard format, i.e. the first three fields being: **chrom**, **chromStart**, and **chromEnd**.
.. class:: warningmark
All other columns are ignored
